title: Prepare Ingredients
description: Gather all necessary ingredients for Pasta Carbonara, including guanciale or pancetta, pecorino romano cheese, eggs, pasta, black pepper, and optionally garlic. Prepare these ingredients by crushing toasted peppercorns, grating cheese, and preparing eggs.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Gather all ingredients needed for the carbonara within arm's reach to ensure a smooth cooking process. This includes crushing the toasted peppercorns, grating cheese, and preparing eggs.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Gather all necessary ingredients for Pasta Carbonara, including guanciale or pancetta, pecorino romano cheese, eggs, pasta, black pepper, and optionally garlic.

title: Prepare Guanciale
description: Cut guanciale or pancetta into matchstick-sized pieces or chunks. Cook it in a pan until crispy, rendering the fat. Optionally, add garlic and black pepper for flavor. Reserve some guanciale for garnish and some fat for the pasta.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Cut guanciale into matchstick-sized pieces or chunks, ensuring they are visible in the dish. This step is crucial for the traditional flavor and texture of carbonara.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Cut guanciale or pancetta into chunks for the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Cook guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Cook guanciale in olive oil to start the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Cut the guanciale into chunks and render the fat in a cold pan, adding garlic and black pepper for flavor.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Bacon
original_subgoals.description: Slice thick-cut bacon and render the fat in a pan until crispy, reserving some for garnish.

original_subgoals.title: Render Bacon Fat
original_subgoals.description: Continue rendering bacon fat, turning occasionally, and reserve some fat for the pasta.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Bacon
original_subgoals.description: Chop and cook bacon as a substitute for guanciale, which is traditionally used in carbonara.

title: Toast Peppercorns
description: Toast black peppercorns in a pan over medium-low heat until fragrant, moving them around to ensure even toasting. Remove from heat once they start popping and let them cool.

original_subgoals.title: Toast Peppercorns
original_subgoals.description: Toast black peppercorns in a pan over medium-low heat until fragrant, moving them around to ensure even toasting. Remove from heat once they start popping and let them cool.

title: Prepare Cheese
description: Grate Pecorino Romano and optionally Parmigiano Reggiano cheeses finely for use in the carbonara sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Cheese
original_subgoals.description: Grate Pecorino Romano and Parmigiano Reggiano cheeses finely for the carbonara sauce.

title: Prepare Egg Mixture
description: Mix whole eggs and/or egg yolks with grated cheese and black pepper to create the sauce base. Optionally, temper the mixture with a small amount of pasta water to prevent scrambling.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare egg mixture
original_subgoals.description: Beat egg yolks, add parmesan or pecorino, and pepper to make the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Egg Mixture
original_subgoals.description: Crack eggs into a bowl and mix with pecorino cheese to create the egg mixture for the sauce.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Egg Mixture
original_subgoals.description: Mix whole eggs and egg yolks, whisk in grated cheese, and season with black pepper.

original_subgoals.title: Temper Egg Mixture
original_subgoals.description: Add a small amount of pasta water to the egg mixture to temper it and prevent scrambling.

original_subgoals.title: Prepare Egg Mixture
original_subgoals.description: Separate egg yolks and mix with grated cheese and pepper to create the sauce base.

title: Cook Pasta
description: Bring a pot of water to a boil and season it with salt, considering the salty ingredients in carbonara. Cook the pasta in the boiling water until al dente, ensuring it does not stick together. Stir occasionally and do not add oil.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Pasta and Guanciale
original_subgoals.description: Boil salted water for pasta and cook it until al dente. Simultaneously, cook guanciale in a pan with a little olive oil until light golden brown, ensuring it retains some chewiness.

original_subgoals.title: Boil pasta
original_subgoals.description: Boil water, add salt, and cook pasta without oil, stirring occasionally.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Pasta
original_subgoals.description: Cook the pasta in boiling water with a small amount of salt, ensuring it does not stick together.

original_subgoals.title: Boil Pasta Water
original_subgoals.description: Bring water to a boil and season it with salt, adjusting for the salty elements in carbonara.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Spaghetti
original_subgoals.description: Cook spaghetti until al dente, then transfer to the pan with bacon fat, keeping the heat off.

original_subgoals.title: Cook Spaghetti
original_subgoals.description: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente, ensuring not to break the noodles.

title: Combine Ingredients
description: Mix the cooked pasta with the rendered guanciale or bacon and its fat, then add the egg mixture to create a creamy sauce through emulsification. Add pasta water as needed to achieve a creamy consistency without scrambling the eggs. Ensure the pasta is not too hot to avoid scrambling the eggs.

original_subgoals.title: Mix Carbonara
original_subgoals.description: Combine cooked pasta with the egg and cheese mixture, adding guanciale and its fat. Mix thoroughly to emulsify the sauce, ensuring it is creamy and coats the pasta well.

original_subgoals.title: Combine pasta and sauce
original_subgoals.description: Mix cooked pasta with guanciale and egg mixture, ensuring the pasta is not too hot to avoid scrambling the eggs.

original_subgoals.title: Combine Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Combine the cooked pasta with the rendered guanciale and its fat, then add the egg mixture to create a creamy sauce through emulsification.

original_subgoals.title: Combine Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Mix the cooked spaghetti with the egg and cheese mixture, ensuring the eggs do not scramble.

original_subgoals.title: Combine Ingredients
original_subgoals.description: Mix cooked spaghetti with bacon and egg mixture, adding pasta water to achieve a creamy consistency.

title: Finish and Serve
description: Plate the pasta, garnish with additional cheese, crispy bacon, and black pepper, and serve immediately while hot to enjoy the creamy texture and flavors.

original_subgoals.title: Finish and Serve
original_subgoals.description: Plate the carbonara, topping with additional guanciale, black pepper, and cheese. Serve immediately while hot to enjoy the creamy texture and flavors.

original_subgoals.title: Finish and serve
original_subgoals.description: Add final touches of cheese and pepper before serving the carbonara.

original_subgoals.title: Finish and Serve
original_subgoals.description: Finish the dish with additional black pepper and pecorino cheese, and serve immediately.

original_subgoals.title: Plate and Garnish
original_subgoals.description: Plate the pasta, garnish with additional cheese and crispy bacon, and serve.

original_subgoals.title: Finish and Serve
original_subgoals.description: Finish the dish with additional cheese and pepper before serving.
